NAME: Name
CONFIRM_REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_LIST: Do you wanna remove this item from list?
TOAST_EMPTY_LIST_ON_UPDATE: Empty list, if don't need it anymore, delete it.
TOAST_EMPTY_LIST_ON_ADD: Empty list, nothing to add to order.
TOAST_ITEM_ADDED: Item was added to your order.
TOAST_ITEM_UPDATED: Done! Item was updated in your list.
